languages.text: {n}Пигмент татуировки выглядит свежо, ярко контрастируя с цветом кожи, а значит, нанесена она была совсем недавно. Приглядевшись, вы также замечаете пару рубцов у основания шеи, подозрительно напоминающих почти заживший укус.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Пигмент татуировки выглядит свежо, ярко контрастируя с цветом кожи, а значит, нанесена она была совсем недавно. Приглядевшись, вы также замечаете пару рубцов у основания шеи, подозрительно напоминающих почти заживший укус.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The pigment of the tattoo looks fresh, standing out starkly against the colour of his skin, which means that it is a very recent addition. You look closely and you notice a pair of scars at the base of his neck, suspiciously reminiscent of an almost healed bite.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Пигмент татуировки выглядит свежо, ярко контрастируя с цветом кожи, а значит, нанесена она была совсем недавно. Приглядевшись, вы также замечаете пару рубцов у основания шеи, подозрительно напоминающих почти заживший укус.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El color del tatuaje indica que es reciente. A juzgar por lo mucho que destaca de su piel, se ha debido tatuar hace no demasiado. Observas con atención y percibes un par de cicatrices en la base de su cuello, muy similares a un mordisco casi curado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pigment of the tattoo looks fresh, standing out starkly against the colour of his skin, which means that it is a very recent addition. You look closely and you notice a pair of scars at the base of his neck, suspiciously reminiscent of an almost healed bite.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El color del tatuaje indica que es reciente. A juzgar por lo mucho que destaca de su piel, se ha debido tatuar hace no demasiado. Observas con atención y percibes un par de cicatrices en la base de su cuello, muy similares a un mordisco casi curado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}タトゥーの色素は新鮮に見えた。肌の色に対して映えていたので、つまり、ごく最近彫られたということだ。よく見ると、首の付け根に一対の傷跡があるのに気が付いた。これは噛まれた跡のようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pigment of the tattoo looks fresh, standing out starkly against the colour of his skin, which means that it is a very recent addition. You look closely and you notice a pair of scars at the base of his neck, suspiciously reminiscent of an almost healed bite.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}タトゥーの色素は新鮮に見えた。肌の色に対して映えていたので、つまり、ごく最近彫られたということだ。よく見ると、首の付け根に一対の傷跡があるのに気が付いた。これは噛まれた跡のようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}纹身的颜料看起来很鲜艳，与他皮肤的颜色截然不同，这意味着这个纹身是最近在纹上去的。通过进一步观察，你留意到他脖子底部有两处伤痕，这不禁让你怀疑是不久之前刚刚愈合的咬伤。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pigment of the tattoo looks fresh, standing out starkly against the colour of his skin, which means that it is a very recent addition. You look closely and you notice a pair of scars at the base of his neck, suspiciously reminiscent of an almost healed bite.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}纹身的颜料看起来很鲜艳，与他皮肤的颜色截然不同，这意味着这个纹身是最近在纹上去的。通过进一步观察，你留意到他脖子底部有两处伤痕，这不禁让你怀疑是不久之前刚刚愈合的咬伤。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sein Tattoo sieht frisch aus und hebt sich deutlich von der Farbe seiner Haut ab. Es wurde also erst kürzlich gestochen. Bei genauerer Betrachtung bemerkst du zwei Narben an seinem Nacken, die verdächtig an einen nahezu verheilten Biss erinnern.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pigment of the tattoo looks fresh, standing out starkly against the colour of his skin, which means that it is a very recent addition. You look closely and you notice a pair of scars at the base of his neck, suspiciously reminiscent of an almost healed bite.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sein Tattoo sieht frisch aus und hebt sich deutlich von der Farbe seiner Haut ab. Es wurde also erst kürzlich gestochen. Bei genauerer Betrachtung bemerkst du zwei Narben an seinem Nacken, die verdächtig an einen nahezu verheilten Biss erinnern.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les pigments du tatouage, visiblement récents, se détachent nettement sur sa peau. En y regardant de plus près, vous remarquez à la base de son cou deux cicatrices qui rappellent étrangement une morsure.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pigment of the tattoo looks fresh, standing out starkly against the colour of his skin, which means that it is a very recent addition. You look closely and you notice a pair of scars at the base of his neck, suspiciously reminiscent of an almost healed bite.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dövmenin boyası yeni görünüyor. Derisinin rengiyle tezat oluştururcasına öne çıkıyor. Bu da yakın zamanda yapıldığı anlamına geliyor. Yakından bakınca boynunun alt kısmında bir çift yara izi görüyorsun. Neredeyse iyileşmiş bir ısırık izini andırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pigment of the tattoo looks fresh, standing out starkly against the colour of his skin, which means that it is a very recent addition. You look closely and you notice a pair of scars at the base of his neck, suspiciously reminiscent of an almost healed bite.{/n}
